summary: Introduced in the House of Representatives on January 3, 2025, by Ms. Boebert, H.R. 129 is titled the "Abolish the ATF Act". The bill's sole purpose is the complete abolishment of the Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives (ATF), a federal law enforcement agency within the Department of Justice. The text of the bill contains a single operative clause stating, "The Bureau of Alcohol, Tobacco, Firearms and Explosives is hereby abolished." The bill was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary for further consideration.
